name: Motorhell
description:
[Ludum Dare 41 entry for the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"]

Crawl down into the depths of hell and slay biker skeletons with your one and only weapon - A Shotgun.

See how many floors you can clear before succumbing to the gunfire.

Controls:

  • W/S - Move forward/backwards.
  • A/D - Steer left/right.
  • Left mouse button - Shoot.
  • I and O - Adjust mouse sensitivity.

Music used from this channel - https://www.youtube.com/user/AMRPHIS

Dev Rambling: I kinda like this game for the sole fact that it's made in a day and friends had fun with it :) Also finally bought and learned to play guitar since the release of this game, who knows, I might make my own soundtrack for this one day.
